21  package org.opencastproject.external.endpoint;
22  
23  import static io.restassured.RestAssured.given;
24  import static java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
25  import static javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse.SC_OK;
26  import static org.apache.http.HttpStatus.SC_BAD_REQUEST;
27  import static org.apache.http.HttpStatus.SC_CREATED;
28  import static org.apache.http.HttpStatus.SC_FORBIDDEN;
29  import static org.apache.http.HttpStatus.SC_NOT_ACCEPTABLE;
30  import static org.apache.http.HttpStatus.SC_NOT_FOUND;
31  import static org.apache.http.HttpStatus.SC_NO_CONTENT;
32  import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
33  import static org.junit.Assert.assertThat;
34  import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
35  import static org.opencastproject.test.rest.RestServiceTestEnv.testEnvForClasses;
36  
37  import org.opencastproject.test.rest.RestServiceTestEnv;
38  
39  import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
40  import org.json.simple.JSONArray;
41  import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
42  import org.json.simple.parser.JSONParser;
43  import org.junit.AfterClass;
44  import org.junit.BeforeClass;
45  import org.junit.Test;
46  
47  import io.restassured.http.ContentType;
48  import uk.co.datumedge.hamcrest.json.SameJSONAs;
49  
50  /** Test cases for {@link SeriesEndpoint} */
51  public class SeriesEndpointTest {
52  
53    private static final String APP_V1_0_0_JSON = "application/v1.0.0+json";
54    private static final String APP_V1_0_0_XML = "application/v1.0.0+xml";
55  
56    /** The REST test environment */
57    private static final RestServiceTestEnv env = testEnvForClasses(TestSeriesEndpoint.class);
58  
59    /** The json parser */
60    private static final JSONParser parser = new JSONParser();
61  
62    @BeforeClass
63    public static void oneTimeSetUp() {
64      env.setUpServer();
65    }
66  
67    @AfterClass
68    public static void oneTimeTearDown() {
69      env.tearDownServer();
70    }
71  
72    /** Unit test for {@link SeriesEndpoint#getSeriesList(String, String, String, String, int, int, Boolean, Boolean)} */
73    @Test
74    public void testGetSeriesListJson() throws Exception {
75      final String response = given().log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_OK).when().get(env.host("/")).asString();
76  
77      final JSONArray json = (JSONArray) parser.parse(response);
78      assertEquals(1, json.size());
79  
80      final JSONObject series1 = (JSONObject) json.get(0);
81      assertEquals("4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f", series1.get("identifier"));
82      assertEquals("Via API", series1.get("title"));
83      assertEquals("2015-04-16T09:12:36Z", series1.get("created"));
84      assertEquals("Gracie Walsh", series1.get("creator"));
85  
86      final JSONArray subjects = (JSONArray) series1.get("subjects");
87      assertEquals(1, subjects.size());
88      assertEquals("Topic", subjects.get(0));
89    }
90  
91    /** Unit test for {@link SeriesEndpoint#getSeries(String, String, Boolean)} */
92    @Test
93    public void testGetSeriesJson() throws Exception {
94      final String response = given().pathParam("seriesId", "4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f")
95              .accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_OK).when().get(env.host("/{seriesId}"))
96              .asString();
97  
98      final JSONObject json = (JSONObject) parser.parse(response);
99      assertEquals("4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f", json.get("identifier"));
100     assertEquals("Via API", json.get("title"));
101     assertEquals("A series created over the external API", json.get("description"));
102     assertEquals("opencast", json.get("organization"));
103     assertEquals("Gracie Walsh", json.get("creator"));
104     assertEquals("2015-04-16T09:12:36Z", json.get("created"));
105 
106     JSONArray topics = (JSONArray) json.get("subjects");
107     assertEquals(1, topics.size());
108     assertEquals("Topic", topics.get(0));
109 
110     JSONArray contributors = (JSONArray) json.get("contributors");
111     assertTrue(contributors.contains("Nu'man Farooq Morcos"));
112     assertTrue(contributors.contains("Alfie Gibbons"));
113     assertEquals(2, contributors.size());
114 
115     JSONArray publishers = (JSONArray) json.get("publishers");
116     assertTrue(publishers.contains("Sophie Chandler"));
117     assertEquals(1, publishers.size());
118 
119     JSONArray organizers = (JSONArray) json.get("organizers");
120     assertTrue(organizers.contains("Peter Feierabend"));
121     assertTrue(organizers.contains("Florian Naumann"));
122     assertTrue(organizers.contains("Niklas Vogler"));
123     assertEquals(3, organizers.size());
124   }
125 
126   @Test
127   public void testCreateSeriesJson() throws Exception {
128     String metadataJson = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/series/create-series-metadata.json"), UTF_8);
129     given().formParam("metadata", metadataJson).formParam("acl", "[]").formParam("theme", "1234")
130             .accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_CREATED).when().post(env.host("/"));
131   }
132 
133   @Test
134   public void testCreateSeriesWithMissingMetadataJson() throws Exception {
135     given().formParam("acl", "").formParam("theme", "1234").accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect()
136             .statusCode(SC_BAD_REQUEST).when().post(env.host("/"));
137   }
138 
139   @Test
140   public void testNotImplementedSeriesXml() throws Exception {
141     given().accept(APP_V1_0_0_XML).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_NOT_ACCEPTABLE).when().post(env.host("/"));
142   }
143 
144   @Test
145   public void testDeleteSeriesJson() throws Exception {
146     given().pathParam("seriesId", "4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f").accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect()
147             .statusCode(SC_NO_CONTENT).when().delete(env.host("/{seriesId}"));
148   }
149 
150   /** Unit test for {@link SeriesEndpoint#getSeriesMetadata(String, String, String)} */
151   @Test
152   public void testMissingGetSeriesMetadataJson() throws Exception {
153     given().pathParam("seriesId", "unknown-series-id").accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect()
154             .statusCode(SC_NOT_FOUND).when().get(env.host("/{seriesId}/metadata"));
155   }
156 
157   @Test
158   public void testGetSeriesMetadataJson() throws Exception {
159     String expected = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/series/metadata/series-metadata.json"), UTF_8);
160     final String response = given().pathParam("seriesId", "4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f")
161             .accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_OK).when().get(env.host("/{seriesId}/metadata"))
162             .asString();
163     assertThat(expected, SameJSONAs.sameJSONAs(response).allowingAnyArrayOrdering());
164   }
165 
166   /** Unit test for {@link SeriesEndpoint#getSeriesMetadata(String, String, String)} */
167   @Test
168   public void testMissingSeriesGetSeriesMetadataByTypeJson() throws Exception {
169     given().pathParam("seriesId", "unknown-series-id").pathParam("type", "dublincore").accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log()
170             .all().expect().statusCode(SC_NOT_FOUND).when().get(env.host("/{seriesId}/metadata/{type}"));
171   }
172 
173   @Test
174   public void testMissingCatalogGetSeriesMetadataByTypeJson() throws Exception {
175     given().pathParam("seriesId", "4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f").pathParam("type", "missing")
176             .accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_NOT_FOUND).when()
177             .get(env.host("/{seriesId}/metadata/{type}"));
178   }
179 
180   @Test
181   public void testGetSeriesMetadataByTypeJson() throws Exception {
182     String expected = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/series/metadata/series-metadata-dublincore.json"), UTF_8);
183     final String response = given().pathParam("seriesId", "4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f")
184             .queryParam("type", "dublincore/series").accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_OK)
185             .when().get(env.host("/{seriesId}/metadata")).asString();
186     assertThat(expected, SameJSONAs.sameJSONAs(response).allowingAnyArrayOrdering());
187   }

189   /** Unit test for {@link SeriesEndpoint#updateSeriesMetadata(String, String, String, String)} */
190   @Test
191   public void testMissingMetadataUpdateSeriesMetadataJson() throws Exception {
192     given().pathParam("seriesId", "4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f").queryParam("type", "dublincore/series")
193             .contentType(ContentType.URLENC)
194             .accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_BAD_REQUEST).when()
195             .put(env.host("/{seriesId}/metadata"));
196   }
197 
198   @Test
199   public void testEmptyMetadataUpdateSeriesMetadataJson() throws Exception {
200     given().pathParam("seriesId", "4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f").queryParam("type", "dublincore/series")
201             .formParam("metadata", "[]").accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_BAD_REQUEST).when()
202             .put(env.host("/{seriesId}/metadata"));
203   }

244   public void testDeleteMainCatalogDeleteSeriesMetadataJson() throws Exception {

250   @Test
251   public void testDeleteOtherSeriesMetadataJson() throws Exception {
252     String metadata = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/series/metadata/put-metadata.json"), UTF_8);
253     given().pathParam("seriesId", "4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f").queryParam("type", "othercatalog/episode")
254             .formParam("metadata", metadata).accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_NO_CONTENT)
255             .when().delete(env.host("/{seriesId}/metadata"));
256   }
257 
258   /** Unit test for {@link SeriesEndpoint#getSeriesAcl(String, String)} */
259   @Test
260   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
261   public void testGetSeriesAclJson() throws Exception {
262     final String response = given().pathParam("seriesId", "4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f")
263             .accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_OK).when().get(env.host("/{seriesId}/acl"))
264             .asString();
265 
266     final JSONArray json = (JSONArray) parser.parse(response);
267     assertEquals(3, json.size());
268 
269     JSONObject adminRead = new JSONObject();
270     adminRead.put("allow", true);
271     adminRead.put("action", "read");
272     adminRead.put("role", "ROLE_ADMIN");
273 
274     JSONObject adminWrite = new JSONObject();
275     adminWrite.put("allow", true);
276     adminWrite.put("action", "write");
277     adminWrite.put("role", "ROLE_ADMIN");
278 
279     JSONObject anonRead = new JSONObject();
280     anonRead.put("allow", true);
281     anonRead.put("action", "read");
282     anonRead.put("role", "ROLE_ANONYMOUS");
283 
284     assertTrue(json.contains(adminRead));
285     assertTrue(json.contains(adminWrite));
286     assertTrue(json.contains(anonRead));
287   }
288 
289   /** Unit test for {@link SeriesEndpoint#getSeriesProperties(String, String)} */
290   @Test
291   public void testGetSeriesPropertiesJson() throws Exception {
292     final String response = given().pathParam("seriesId", "4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f")
293             .accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_OK).when()
294             .get(env.host("/{seriesId}/properties")).asString();
295 
296     final JSONObject json = (JSONObject) parser.parse(response);
297     assertEquals(2, json.size());
298     assertEquals("false", json.get("live"));
299     assertEquals("true", json.get("ondemand"));
300   }
301 
302   @Test
303   public void testUpdateSeriesAclJson() throws Exception {
304     final String updatedAcl = "[{\"allow\":true,\"action\":\"write\",\"role\": \"ROLE_ADMIN\"},{\"allow\": true,\"action\": \"read\",\"role\": \"ROLE_USER\"}]";
305     final String response = given().pathParam("seriesId", "4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f")
306             .formParam("acl", updatedAcl).accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_OK).when()
307             .put(env.host("/{seriesId}/acl")).asString();
308 
309     final JSONArray json = (JSONArray) parser.parse(response);
310     assertEquals(parser.parse(updatedAcl), json);
311   }
312 
313   @Test
314   public void testUpdateSeriesPropertiesJson() throws Exception {
315     final String updatedProperties = "{\"live\":true,\"ondemand\":\"true\"}";
316     final String response = given().pathParam("seriesId", "4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f")
317             .formParam("properties", updatedProperties).accept(APP_V1_0_0_JSON).log().all().expect().statusCode(SC_OK)
318             .when().put(env.host("/{seriesId}/properties")).asString();
319 
320     final JSONObject json = (JSONObject) parser.parse(response);
321     assertEquals(parser.parse(updatedProperties), json);
322   }
